tweets.author: TheFrenchie
tweets.text: Imagine if Obama, Biden, or Harris said this about Charlie Kirk.

thread_replies.author: carol williams
thread_replies.text: Trump is disgraceful! Period!

thread_replies.author: TheFrenchie
thread_replies.text: Totally agree

thread_replies.author: Sue Elligson
thread_replies.text: I’m so disgusted with this post, just when I think I can’t hate him more than I do already. He is a vile excuse for a human being.

thread_replies.author: TheFrenchie
thread_replies.text: He is evil

thread_replies.author: Michael G.
thread_replies.text: And they’re not even currently occupying the Oval Office - this is from a sitting president, a new low even for him.

thread_replies.author: Rick Wilson
thread_replies.text:
Remember when people were cancelled for not expressing the proper Official Emotions of Grief for Charlie Kirk?

Yeah, me too.

In related news, Trump's grave will reek of ammonia for all eternity.

thread_replies.text: How President Trump reacted to the brutal murder of Rob Reiner and Michele Reiner vs How Rob Reiner reacted to the brutal murder of Charlie Kirk.

thread_replies.author: Leslieoo7
thread_replies.text: I can't imagine being fecked up enough to read that deranged vitriol and think, "that's my president; I voted for this." I don't get it and I never will.

thread_replies.author: Joey Salads
thread_replies.text: The left was cancelled for CELEBRATING Charlie’s death, don’t get it twisted

thread_replies.author: HOUmanitarian ™
thread_replies.text: And asparagus.

thread_replies.text: Trump is a delusional treasonous pathological liar FUCKING moron conman rancid fishlips grossly incompetent impeached twice a multitude of indictments & counting insurrectionists diabolical sinister evil psychotic sociopathic narcissistic feckless obtuse coward demented insane

thread_replies.author: Richard Angwin
thread_replies.text: Trump's ghoulish mockery of Rob Reiner's murder, blaming "TDS" on a family tragedy, exposes a heartless narcissist unfit for leadership, while Reiner showed grace condemning Kirk's assassination. Disgraceful hypocrisy.

thread_replies.author: Rio Veradonir
thread_replies.text: Nobody is as deranged by Trump as Trump himself.

thread_replies.author: GC
thread_replies.text: Charlie Kirk and Rob Reiner were not leaders of the free world. The office of the President is supposed to uphold a professional standard, but Trump is incapable of that, which is why he's do disrespected.

thread_replies.author: Jen
thread_replies.text: And how would Rob Reiner have reacted if it was Trump that was murdered?? He would probably have popping champagne and bragging on bluesky.
